layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x50
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x50
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x18
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x18
        LayoutInline {A} at (0,0) size 320x18 [color=#008000]
          LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 320x18
            text run at (0,0) width 320: "Whatever you do to this link, it should stay green."
        LayoutText {#text} at (319,0) size 202x18
          text run at (319,0) width 202: " (hover, focus, activate, follow)"
